title: JAX-bandflux: differentiable supernovae SALT modelling for cosmological analysis on GPUs
description: JAX-bandflux is a JAX implementation of critical supernova modelling functionality for cosmological analysis. The codebase implements key components of the established library SNCosmo in a differentiable framework, offering efficient parallelisation and gradient-based optimisation capabilities through GPU acceleration.

creators.name: Leeney, Samuel Alan Kossoff
